title: 2nd year hostel
content:
Does management ppl get priority this year also?
Does DW really matter? 
Is there any chance of not getting hostel if DW is high? 

Senior hosteller pls answer(RR Boys hostel)

comments.body:
No management people won't get priority unless and until u have some backup ( knowing the director personally)
2nd year room will be given on FCFS basis (temporary) and on whoever paid first( permanent room allotment)

You're allotted to A and B lists according to DW ( and C list people aren't even allowed to apply for next year ) , I think priority matters based on which list you are in , which depends on the DW. If you're from the same list , then it matters on who paid first ( FCFS)
